name: Go
prompt_template:
This is a Go project.

Project Structure:
- Uses Go modules (go.mod)
- Main entry point: main.go
- Build with: go build
- Run with: go run .

When implementing:
- Follow Go conventions and idioms
- Use proper error handling
- Structure code in packages
- Add dependencies with: go get <package>
- Ensure go.mod is properly maintained
